name: P.O.S.S.U.M.
description:
Explore the city rooftops and a haunted hotel lobby to find artifacts from the past.

Made for the Haunted PS1 2021 Madvent calendar.  Go check it out!

CONTROLS: WASD + Mouse to move, left-click to interact, shift to run, space to jump

Credits:

Graphics, design, programming, and Music by VaporShark

PS1 shader derived from the work of MenacingMecha: https://github.com/MenacingMecha/godot-psx-style-demo

Software used: Godot 3.3, Blender 2.8, Audacity, Gimp, Dialogic Plugin for Godot.
